titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: C. Chandler Ross was assistant curator of the Ornithology Department at the Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia. One of his primary research interests was albinism in birds, on which he published a number of articles. He was a member of the Delaware Valley Ornithological Society.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of incoming and outgoing correspondence related to Ross's work on albinism, including requests for reprints, descriptions of specimens, exchange of specimens, and queries from birdwatchers about species identification; The collection also includes reprints of articles by Ross and others on albinism and melanism in birds and a manuscript and a typescript description of the specimens in the Delaware Valley Ornithological Club Collection.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia Ornithology Department records and Delaware Valley Ornithological Club records.
